{"id":813458342,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1664711260,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/813458342/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"44 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        s = s.toLowerCase();\n        \n        StringBuilder ab = new StringBuilder();\n        for(int i = 0; i<s.length(); i++){\n            if(Character.isDigit(s.charAt(i)) || Character.isLetter(s.charAt(i))){\n                ab.append(s.charAt(i));\n            }\n        }\n        int n = ab.length()-1;\n        for(int i = 0; i<ab.length()/2; i++){\n            if(ab.charAt(i)!= ab.charAt(n-i))return false;\n        }\n         return true;\n                                 \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false}
